mainDesc: Apartment Verano, featuring a garden and a terrace, is located in Njivice, 500 m from Dog Beach Kijac and 1.1 km from FKK Njivice Kijac. The air-conditioned accommodation is 400 m from Kijac Beach, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with garden views. The nearest airport is Rijeka, 14 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
